items.name: Iron Hook

items.description: A glowing blue mushroom. Probably magical.

items.description: A small glass bottle.
items.name: Empty Bottle

items.description: A glowing blue potion. Who knows what it does?
items.name: Magic Potion

items.name: Ancient Book

items.description: A crystal that pulses with inner light.
items.name: Glowing Crystal

items.name: Map Piece (Corner)

items.description: Another piece of the old map.
items.name: Map Piece (Center)

items.description: A complete map showing the location of hidden treasure!
items.name: Treasure Map

items.description: A beautiful red gemstone. Very valuable.
items.name: Ruby Gemstone

items.description: A heavy brass key with intricate engravings. It feels cold to the touch.
items.name: Ornate Key

items.description: A tarnished silver candelabra covered in cobwebs. The candles are long extinguished.
items.name: Dusty Candelabra

items.description: A leather-bound book with strange symbols on the cover. The pages are filled with occult writings.
items.name: Ancient Tome

items.description: A Victorian magnifying glass with a mother-of-pearl handle. Perfect for examining small details.
items.name: Magnifying Glass

items.description: A delicate silver locket containing a faded photograph of a beautiful woman. The inscription reads 'Forever, E.'
items.name: Silver Locket

items.description: An elegant music box that plays a haunting melody. The mechanism still works perfectly.
items.name: Music Box
